highlights: A highly innovative and passionate Full-Stack front-end web development technologist, with over 10 years of experience in developing and designing creative and interactive user-centric websites and portals. Looking to build scalable, performing applications and creating meaningful user experiences through beautiful and inspired web applications. Possess a strong security mindset, integrating secure coding practices and proactive measures to mitigate risks in web application development.
